node.display_long_description:
Note: This game takes around 10-15 hours to complete, with new paths that unlock with multiple playthroughs. Don't stop playing after the first credits roll! 

TOKYO CHRONOS is the VR game that has multiple-choice decision points as well as more than one ending. It has a long story you've never experienced before with VR.
The game takes place in Shibuya, Tokyo, which has only eight people, including you, the protagonist, Kyosuke Sakurai. Can you solve the mystery and get out of the silent Shibuya?

-Features-
● Drastic advancement of visual novel games with VR 
The total gameplay time reaches to 15 hours. The story has multiple-choice decision points as well as more than one ending.

●Moving scenario making your HMD wet with your tears 
One review says, "I've purchased several games at the Oculus store, and none of them satisfied me. But TOKYO CHRONOS is no comparison. At first, you're surprised at the beautiful images. But the deep story surpasses it".

nodes.title: TOKYO CHRONOS Sequel ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos has received over 800 reviews on the Oculus Quest Store
nodes.body_text:
Hello, this is the MyDearest team.

ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos, the sequel of TOKYO CHRONOS,  has received over 800 reviews now.

Thank you for your playing and reviewing the game.

We’d appreciate it if you play ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos after completing TOKYO CHRONOS.

As we announced last week, we’re planning to release its new DLC, ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos EPISODE YAMATO, in early June. The story will feature Yamato Amanagi, a member of Prometheus and pilot of the Ares Makhia who appeared in the main story.

We hope you’ll still enjoy the Chronos series world.

Thank you for your continued support.

Best regards,

The MyDearest Team

こんにちは！マイディアレスト開発チームです！
この度は東京クロノスをプレイ頂きありがとうございます！

東京クロノス続編の『アルトデウス：ビヨンドクロノス（以下、アルトデウスBC）』の
Oculus Questでのレビュー数が800件を超えました！

ご購入頂きレビュー頂いたみなさま、ありがとうございます！

東京クロノスをお楽しみ頂いた方、是非ともアルトデウスBCもプレイして頂けますと幸いです！

アルトデウスBCでは来月上旬には本編にも登場したヤマト・アマナギ（CV.小林裕介）が主人公のDLC『アルトデウス：BC エピソード ヤマト』の発売も控えておりますので、お楽しみ頂けたらと思います！

引き続き皆さまからのご支援のほど、よろしくお願い致します！

マイディアレスト開発チーム一同より

nodes.title: TOKYO CHRONOS Sequel ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos Launches DLC On Oculus Quest In Early June
nodes.body_text:
Hello, this is the MyDearest team.

As we announced at the live stream event on May 14 in Japan, we’ll release a new DLC of ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos, ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos EPISODE YAMATO, in early June.

ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos is the sequel of TOKYO CHRONOS after two hundred years from the first game.

In the new DLC, ALTDEUS: Beyond Chronos EPISODE YAMATO, you will play as Second Lieutenant Yamato Amanagi, a member of Prometheus and pilot of the Ares Makhia. Chloe tries to escape from Prometheus with Anima, but Yamato stands in her way carrying the hopes of his comrades - to bring her back or die trying.

The Swordstrike system, the awesome power of Ares Makhia's sword, will provide you with new interactive experiences, taking approximately 2 hours to complete all of the story branches.

It will be available for Oculus Quest / Oculus Quest 2 early in June for $9.99 featuring English and Japanese voice acting and Chinese (Simplified), and French subtitles.

We hope you’re excited to hear this news and you’ll enjoy the DLC.

Best regards,

The MyDearest Team

こんにちは！マイディアレスト開発チームです！
この度は東京クロノスをプレイ頂きありがとうございます！

5月14日（金）の21時より行われた弊社の新規プロジェクト発表配信イベントにて発表された通り、6月上旬に、東京クロノス続編の『アルトデウス：ビヨンドクロノス（以下、アルトデウスBC）』のDLC『アルトデウス：BC エピソード ヤマト』を発売することになりました！

タイトル通り今回は、クロエ（CV.鬼頭明里）と同じ対メテオラ用人型都市防衛兵器「マキア」のパイロットで本編にも登場した、ヤマト・アマナギ（CV.小林裕介）が主人公の新エピソードとなり、皆さまにはヤマト視点でゲームをプレイして頂きます！

DCLの価格は990円（税込）で、Oculus Quest、Oculus Quest2での先行配信となります！
アルトデウスBC本編をご購入頂いた方のみが購入可能となります！
具体的な発売日は決まり次第改めてお知らせ致します！

発売まであとあと少しですが、皆さまに最高の作品をお届けすべく開発チーム一同ラストスパートをかけて制作に励んでおりますので、もう少々お待ち下さい！

マイディアレスト開発チーム一同より

node.reviewDescription:
Please note that this is a visual novel (VN) and mainly consists of clicking through dialogue and there is no gameplay. I didn’t realize this fact and was fairly disappointed and would’ve given this game one star if it weren’t for the ending. At first it’s pretty boring as you’re simply clicking through an anime in VR. What saves this game is the ending (the true ending) which is extremely beautiful and gives you a sense of accomplishment. See more below to help you with the game (may contain spoilers).
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
A couple of things to help you out:
1. Always choose the left option to get through all the subchapters for the true ending. Once you choose left, you will always have the option to go back to the ‘right’ choice. I made the mistake of choosing right in the first choice and had to go back later on.
2. You have to play this game twice. The first time sets the stage but leaves many questions unanswered. The second time will answer everything and you will get the true ending. There are a lot of repeats but you can quickly click the dialogue away or use the skip feature. But there is new information intertwined in each ‘Re:chapter’ (the second play-through).
3. Only after going through the first chapters (aka chapters), the second chapters (aka Re:chapters) and the left choices (aka subchapters) will you be able to unlock the true ending.

SUPER SPOILER BELOW:
.
.
.
.
.
.
Without going into too much detail and ruining the ending, I wanted to point out that the main story is about suicide which may make some uncomfortable.



Overall I feel it’s worth it to try as long as you know what you’re getting into since the idea is quite novel and the ending is fantastic. I might even think about getting the sequel, Altdeus: beyond chronos, which looks more interactive. This is quite a surprise since after playing this game for a few hours I really didn’t think it was worth it but I was convinced by the end.
